programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Dino Cake / Dumplings - Olly wants to make a simple cake for her Dinosaur Club, but Chef insists on complicating the recipe.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Paddington's Beach Clean-Up / Paddington's Holiday Farewell - The beach is a mess, but will all the litter be cleared in time for the beach party that everyone has been looking forward to?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Stuntmania! - Darington has built the ultimate stunt-track, and every Monster Machine in town is coming to see the show!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Pups Save a Talent Show / Pups Save the Corn Roast - It's Adventure Bay Talent Show Day! When the mayor is afraid there won't be enough acts, the super talented Pups can definitely help out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Pups Leave Marshall Home Alone / Pups Save the Deer - With the other pups at parachute training, Marshall must get a group of loose kittens back all by himself. But he has the help of the other pups' packs!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Sherman in the Middle / Smoothie Day - Hank becomes frustrated when he has to share his father's time with his new stepsisters. // As the squiddos prepare for Smoothie Day, William makes a new friend whose jokes are more hurtful than funny.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Innovation Melting Pot / Make Up Your Mind Barbazoo - The Barbababies want to invent like Leonardo da Vinci. // The Barbababies must choose between going to the pool or going for a bike ride.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Paddington And The Lake Monster / Paddington's Space Radio - Mr Curry is sure there is a monster in the park lake and Paddington sets out to help him prove it.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Smoothie Shop / The Crew Builds A Dino Roof Party - Caf Carl opens up a smoothie shop on the boardwalk! But when the coaster causes coconut chaos, Rubble & Crew know just what to do.

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Partly Claudia / Ranita's Magic Stripes - Dora and Boots take Claudia, an energetic young rain cloud, to rain on a dry water slide.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Trouble At The Truck Wash - When an overeager Crusher causes the Truck Wash to explode out into Axle City, Blaze and friends will need your help using angles to recover the pieces and get the trucks clean again!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Pizza / Bread - Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil!

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep202
programme.desc: No Fishes in This School - It's the first day of school, and Sharkdog's not allowed to come; well, that's never stopped him before!

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Going Wild - When Sharkdog's wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep204
programme.desc: A Not So Grand Opening - When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquarium's owner, catches on.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Goldie's Fintuition / Raising Remy - When Goldie becomes a psychic, Baby and William set out to make her predictions come true. // Baby and William look after a baby reef rabbit and learn how difficult it is to be a parent.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep221
programme.desc: Fishy Force - Vola, Goldie, Chucks, and Hank feel left out when they learn that Baby and William have been keeping a super secret.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Pup Pup Goose / Pup Pup and Away - Marshal gets a new BFF when a gosling he names Fuzzy takes a liking to him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep713
programme.desc: Pups Save A Lost Gold Miner - Uncle Otis takes a trip to a lost gold mine. After wandering off course, Ryder and the Pups must save him from the booby-trapped mine.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Foggy Day - Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they cant see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Polly's Boat Trip - Peppa and George go boating with Grandpa Pig and Polly Parrot, but later Grandpa Pig drops his mobile phone into the water.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Delphine Donkey - Peppa's French friend Delphine Donkey comes to stay. Peppa takes Delphine to daycare for a visit, where they teach her the 'Bing Bong Song', the class' favorite song to sing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Fire Engine - When Mummy Pig helps out at Miss Rabbit's fire station, she is called upon to douse the flames at Daddy Pig's out-of-control barbecue!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep136
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt - Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep137
programme.desc: Mystery Present - Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Fruit Chews / Opera Cake - Henrys in a Snail Race! But Chef's fruit chews for Henry's mid-race snack are taking too long to set!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Granola Bars - When Morton the Butterfly's travel snack crash lands on the Stump, Chef and Olly compete to make him the best snack for his journey.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Songtime - Tinky Winky, Dispy, LaaLaa and Po enjoy Tiddlytubbies Songtime. Then it is time for Teletubbies Songtime. The Teletubbies sing solo before singing all together.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep3
programme.desc: C - Dee encourages a friend to say 'c', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We see some cute coconuts, a camper van, and meet a cool camel!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep48
programme.desc: The Legend of the Golden Pencil - On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are learning about the seven wonders of Pop Paper City. But when they realise that one of the seven wonders has never been found, can Explorer Plom and friends find it?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Big Hearted Messy - Messy and friends have a giant adventure. It's up to them to get Lofty's heart pumping and celebrate his birthday!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Obstacle Course - Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Promises - Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Sea Arch Escape - Xuli's flying race around the Academy inspires cadet Tala to fly the Grimbler. But she crashes into a fragile sea arch that could collapse right on top of her!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Go Jetters Academy: Ghost Crabs - Glitch takes all the sand from the Academy beach, leaving the local crabs with nowhere to hide from hungry seagulls. Can the Go Jetters repair the beach before it's too late?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Claw - When Bluey and Bingo are unable to grab a prize on a Magic Claw machine, Mum and Dad create their own version at home. But Dad isn't about to make winning easy.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Doctor - Honey is stuck waiting for Dr Bingo's as the other injuries get seen before her. Receptionist Bluey tells her to be patient, some of these cases are a real pickle!

programme.title: Andy's Safari Adventures S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Andy and The Manakin - Andy heads to Central America in search of the manakin bird, so he can learn its amazing dance moves.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Mission: Missing Map - Annie is in a kayak, but she's lost her map and is totally lost. She's cold and wet and has hurt her wrist. At the Woofton Search and Rescue Centre, Tom and Meagaidh need to find Annie, and fast!

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep19
programme.desc: Sandy and Seaweed's Scarecrow Challenge - It is harvest day on Captain Captain's vegetable patch and Sandy and Seaweed are helping dig up her carrots.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Chocolate Hills, Philippines - Greedy Grandmaster Glitch has been gorging on chocolate and wants more! The Grimbots discover a place called the Chocolate Hills on Bohol Island in the Philippines and take him there.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Volcanic Island - Grandmaster Glitch is drilling near an underwater volcano in the ocean beside Academy Island in search of some hot bubbly mud.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep9
programme.desc: Diesel Do Right - After being scolded for making a mistake, Diesel plays a trick on Rebecca to try and get the other engines in trouble.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Balloon Barnacles - Sarah's hat goes on an adventure without her, on top of a balloon.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep17
programme.desc: Cake Decorate - Cake decides to teach Sarah and Duck how to decorate with icing!

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Knitting - Stanley must teach his friends how to knit. They all knit so much they burst out the top of the community centre. Stanley repairs the roof with the groups knitting.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Runaway Train - Stanley must deliver some parcels on the train but ends up delivering the wrong ones. After correcting his mistake, he has to muster the townsfolk to help stop his runaway train.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Flower Power - Monty tries to get his family to play football with him, but they are all too busy doing flower-related activities.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep7
programme.desc: It's Time to Dress Up - JoJo and Gran Gran have fun finding Gran Gran's old clothes. When Charlene brings round a sewing machine, it's time for a Gran Gran plan - they can make JoJo some new clothes too!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep25
programme.desc: Ragdoll - Dad agrees to take Bluey and Bingo to the shops to buy an ice-cream if they can get him into the car. Only problem is... he's just entered 'Ragdoll' mode!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Bedroom - Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Obstacle Course - Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep13
programme.desc: The Dancing Bug Badge - When a dancing bug lands on Duggee's head, he can't stop dancing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep12
programme.desc: The Teamwork Badge - A big box is delivered to the Clubhouse and the Squirrels are very excited.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep11
programme.desc: The Pottery Badge - When Roly surprises Duggee, Duggee jumps and drops his cup, which shatters into pieces.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Go Jetters Academy: Ghost Crabs - Glitch takes all the sand from the Academy beach, leaving the local crabs with nowhere to hide from hungry seagulls. Can the Go Jetters repair the beach before it's too late?

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Banana - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's Banana revealing yet another astonishing secret about herself in the opera piece, "I've Got a Secret".

programme.desc: Cabbage - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's the marvellous Cabbage and his dazzling super-veggie memory skills.

programme.desc: Banana's Star Appeal - Banana superstar's show is stopped when Pea steals his peel. Supertato races against Evil Pea to get it back but trouble hits when a giant Banana statue collapses onto the stage.

programme.desc: Spooky Day - Supertato runs in fright when Pumpkin tries to make friends with him, but later realises she needs his help as she's stuck in the air hanging from balloons set up by Evil Pea.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5

programme.desc: How democracy can fail: Lessons from Germany - Democracies can fail. Current events have raised the question of how stable or fragile democratic structures are, and whether democracy is much more vulnerable than we think. What parallels are there to the situation today, and what can we learn from the past?

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vettori vs. Dolidze 2
programme.desc: Prelims - In 2023, middleweight contenders Marvin Vettori and Roman Dolidze battled it out for three rounds, with Italys Vettori taking a hard-fought decision. Georgias Dolidze is coming off the best year of his career in 2024, as he defeated Anthony Smith and Kevin Holland, putting him in prime form as he attempts to solve the puzzle presented by the veteran Vettori

programme.title: UFC 313: Pereira vs. Ankalaev
programme.desc: Prelims - After a historic 2024 campaign that saw him step into the Octagon three times in defense of his UFC light heavyweight title and emerge with three knockout victories, Brazilian superstar Alex Pereira begins the new year in Las Vegas with a UFC 313 main event clash against number one contender Magomed Ankalaev on March 9. A Russian powerhouse who is unbeaten for over six years, Ankalaev will now try to decipher the puzzle presented by Poatan, one of the most dominant champions in the world. Plus, high-level action is guaranteed when lightweights Justin Gaethje and Dan Hooker meet in a highly anticipated co-main event.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Edwards vs. Brady
programme.desc: Prelims - Former UFC welterweight champion Leon Edwards begins his road back to the belt at Londons O2 Arena on March 22, as he faces Philly tough Sean Brady in a UFC Fight Night main event. A hard-charging force on fight night, Brady has put together back-to-back wins over Kelvin Gastelum and Gilbert Burns heading into the biggest night of his career against the fighting pride of Birmingham, England, who aims to use a win over Brady to propel himself into an opportunity to regain his 170-pound title.

A hard-charging force on fight night, Brady has put together back-to-back wins over Kelvin Gastelum and Gilbert Burns heading into the biggest night of his career against the fighting pride of Birmingham, England, who aims to use a win over Brady to propel himself into an opportunity to regain his 170-pound title.
